main event: On February 3, 1965, a civilian observer in Tallahassee, Florida reported seeing a single unidentified flying object for 15 seconds, moving vertically.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 15 seconds,The conclusion reached was that the object was an astronomical event, specifically a star,Despite efforts, only one credible witness was interviewed,The investigation suggested the possibility of a hoax due to limited witness responses,The object was described as grapefruit-sized and emitting a faint humming sound.
witness description: a civilian observer who described the object as round, grapefruit-sized, bluish with no discernible features
